channel.title: Need help with ip & port please
channel.description: Well, I Decided to make own server,i had old computer,i just maked ip on no-ip.org,and downloaded source and it worked,well i got new computer and that way doesn't work.I Download Duc Or w/e I Can log in with the ip but any1 else can't i really WANT make a server. :) What i must do please help. I Don't got router i think but i got adaphter the i share ps3/computer internet. PLEASE HELP

item.title: Need help with ip & port please
item.dc:creator: @0bby_pk3r_96 0bby pk3r 96
item.description:
@0bby_pk3r_96 wrote:

[quote=“SquirrelScape, post:4, topic:269050”]Use uttorent, heres a quick tut ill try to make.

  1. google utorrent, download it
  2. set it up
  3. Open it up, and go to the top, click options
  4. then go down to preferences, click it.
  5. Something should open up, on the left side it says: UI Settings, Directorys, Connection,Bandwidth ETC
  6. Go down to Connection, click it.
  7. On the top it will say: Port used for incoming connections (numbers here)
  8. In that box with numbers in it, put 43594 in there.
  9. Below it there will be 4 little boxes with words beside them
  10. Check ALL of the boxes EXCEPT “Randomize Port Each Start”
  11. Go to the bottem, apply, then click ok.
  12. You should be back to the main Utorrent screen thing.
  13. Click on the top on the GREEN ARROW Going to the right.
    NOW YOU HAVE UTTORENT SETUP SO PEOPLE CAN CONNECT.
    To run your server, just change the port to a ANY PORT then click apply, then run your server, THEN change the port back to 43594.
    Finished.[/quote]
    idk,i got mega virus from utorrent b4 or was it bitorrent or something xd that looks exactly same than it…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 23, 2009, 09:55:32 am[/size][hr]it didnt fucking work…im getting mad

Read full topic

item.source: Need help with ip & port please

item.title: Need help with ip & port please
item.dc:creator: @SquirrelScape SquirrelScape
item.description:
@SquirrelScape wrote:

Use uttorent, heres a quick tut ill try to make.

  1. google utorrent, download it
  2. set it up
  3. Open it up, and go to the top, click options
  4. then go down to preferences, click it.
  5. Something should open up, on the left side it says: UI Settings, Directorys, Connection,Bandwidth ETC
  6. Go down to Connection, click it.
  7. On the top it will say: Port used for incoming connections (numbers here)
  8. In that box with numbers in it, put 43594 in there.
  9. Below it there will be 4 little boxes with words beside them
  10. Check ALL of the boxes EXCEPT “Randomize Port Each Start”
  11. Go to the bottem, apply, then click ok.
  12. You should be back to the main Utorrent screen thing.
  13. Click on the top on the GREEN ARROW Going to the right.
    NOW YOU HAVE UTTORENT SETUP SO PEOPLE CAN CONNECT.
    To run your server, just change the port to a ANY PORT then click apply, then run your server, THEN change the port back to 43594.
    Finished.

Read full topic
